word: Our God is a very present help in time of need. He is acquainted with the most secret thoughts of our hearts, with all the intents and purposes of our souls. When we are in perplexity, even before we open to Him our distresses, He is making arrangements for our deliverance.--Letter 73, Feb. 1, 1905, to Drs. D. H. and Lauretta Kress.
